data.title: PAUL BALLARD FILM STILLS COLLECTION
data.text:
DOROTHY GISH & her husband JAMES RENNIE

THEDA BARA in the lost film CLEOPATRA (1917)

The following is a partial list of a collection of 18,000 film stills that we have here at the archive. Film titles have anywhere from 1 – 50 images and they are available to license for academic purposes. If you are simply a fan and desire personal copies of production photos, I suggest you contact the Academy Margaret Herrick Library as they sell photo orders
